item.title: Monoglotism in TurboGears\...
item.description: or how the support for localization in Turbo Gears seems to be borked! I have spent several hours trying to get a very simple Turbo Gears sample application to “speak” a different language, with no success. This is all part of my research at work to localize our rPath Appliance Agent to other idioms. The rPath Appliance Agent (rAA) is a framework for administering appliances built with rPath technologies through a web based user interface.
